TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DecimalType extends System.Object

Docs.summary: This class has been deprecated as of Visual Basic 2005.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides methods for manipulating data that potentially represents a `Decimal` value.
